DaisyAD_DroppedStone.synopsis: The player has dropped the stone recklessly somewhere (leaves inventory, with some exceptions such as camp). Daisy will warn the player that it's a really bad idea and to be careful with such an important item. Repeating in a short time frame will obviously irritate the Emperor.
DaisyAD_DroppedStone.how_to_trigger: Aquire any NetherstoneDrop the stone on the groundRepeat

PAD_BoatBlocked.synopsis: The boat that leads to the Morphic Pool sits gently in the Lower City Underground. The player (and Emperor) have no idea that the Netherbrain is located nearby, so this boat has no purpose yet.
PAD_BoatBlocked.how_to_trigger: Teleport to the boatclick on it

EmperorAD_LostIntermezzoStone.synopsis: A player left Ketheric's stone in the Astral Plane when they ended their camp night in Intermezzo. The Emperor is kind enough to send the stone to their camp chest and give them a bit of shit.
EmperorAD_LostIntermezzoStone.how_to_trigger: Load INT_Main_AUse debugbook to get Ketheric's stoneStart the night eventGo through the portalDrop the stoneComplete the night

EmperorAD_AtBeachForLostStones.synopsis: The player has arrived to the beach where the Sahuagin Attack Booster takes place in lower city after losing a stone in Iron Throne. Depending what state the attack is in (hasn't started yet, already happened and merchant alive or dead), then the stones can be found on either the leading Sahuagin, the merchant which the player needs to buy back, or in a dead fish that swallowed them.
EmperorAD_AtBeachForLostStones.how_to_trigger: Go to Iron ThroneDebug add the stones (example, oe glo_emperorprelude_gortash)Drop one or more stonesLeave Iron Thronegoto 35 7 -142Go to the beach

EmperorAD_ReceivedIronThroneStones.synopsis: The player has gotten the Netherstones they lost in Iron Throne back from the beach in lower city. The player is very lucky they were able to get the stones back, since in most circumstances they would be shit out of luck.

EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone.synopsis: The player dropped one or more of theNetherstones in Iron Throne and left before picking them up. The Emperor is not very pleased with the player and tells them to search the beach in hopes of finding them. Depending on the state of the booster Sahuagin Attack, the stones will be on one of the attacking Sahuagin, the fishmongers inventory, or in a dead fish that choked on them and washed ashore.
EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone.how_to_trigger: Go to Iron ThroneDebug add the stones (example, oe glo_emperorprelude_gortash)Drop one or more stonesLeave Iron ThroneWait for AD to trigger

EmperorAD_DroppedStone.synopsis: The player has dropped the stone recklessly somewhere (leaves inventory, with some exceptions such as camp). The Emperorwill warn the player that it's a really bad idea and to be careful with such an important item. Repeating in a short time frame will obviously irritate the Emperor. This AD will play instead of the Daisy varient whenever it no longer makes sense to communicate as Daisy.
EmperorAD_DroppedStone.how_to_trigger: Aquire any NetherstoneDrop the stone on the groundRepeat

DaisyAD_DroppedStone_0.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
DaisyAD_DroppedStone_0.text: You can keep doing this if you want, but I'm sure you won't like the consequences.

DaisyAD_DroppedStone_1.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
DaisyAD_DroppedStone_1.text: If you really don't want to carry it, at least leave it somewhere safe. Your camp, for example.

DaisyAD_DroppedStone_2.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
DaisyAD_DroppedStone_2.text: Are you trying to annoy me, or just careless?

DaisyAD_DroppedStone_4.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
DaisyAD_DroppedStone_4.text: I wouldn't recommend losing that. We can't defeat the brain without that stone.

PAD_BoatBlocked_0.speaker: Player
PAD_BoatBlocked_0.text: Abandoned by the looks of it. Perhaps it had a leak.

PAD_BoatBlocked_1.speaker: Player
PAD_BoatBlocked_1.text: Nice boat - I wonder what it's doing here?

EmperorAD_LostIntermezzoStone_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_LostIntermezzoStone_0.text: You left Ketheric's stone behind. I sent it to your camp.

EmperorAD_LostIntermezzoStone_1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_LostIntermezzoStone_1.text: Try not to be so careless once you possess the others.

EmperorAD_AtBeachForLostStones_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_AtBeachForLostStones_0.text: Wait - that hum of Netherese power. It's coming from the merchant!

EmperorAD_AtBeachForLostStones_1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_AtBeachForLostStones_1.text: Wait - that hum of Netherese power. It's coming from that sahuagin!

EmperorAD_AtBeachForLostStones_2.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_AtBeachForLostStones_2.text: Wait - that hum of power. There's a Netherstone nearby!

EmperorAD_ReceivedIronThroneStones_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_ReceivedIronThroneStones_0.text: You are as lucky as you are careless. Do not let the stones out of your sight.

EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone_0.text: Of all the things you could have lost at sea, you lost the Netherstones.

EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone_1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone_1.text: Pray that we find them on the nearest shore or you have doomed us all.

EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone_2.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone_2.text: Of all the things you could have lost at sea, you lost a Netherstone.

EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone_3.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_LeftStonesInIronThrone_3.text: Pray that we find it on the nearest shore or you have doomed us all.

EmperorAD_DroppedStone_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_DroppedStone_0.text: If you insist on doing this, I hope you enjoy being a thrall.

EmperorAD_DroppedStone_1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_DroppedStone_1.text: If you really don't want to carry it, at least leave the stone somewhere safe, like your camp.

EmperorAD_DroppedStone_2.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_DroppedStone_2.text: Are you trying to annoy me, or just woefully careless?

EmperorAD_DroppedStone_4.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
EmperorAD_DroppedStone_4.text: What are you doing? We cannot defeat the brain without that stone.
